column4: When I use lots of PPA's, and upgrade to a new version of Ubuntu, will the PPA's be updated along with it?

When I use lots of PPA's, and upgrade to a new version of Ubuntu, will the PPA's be updated along with it? Also, how do I upgrade to a new version of Ubuntu without losing any settings, customization, PPA's, and apps?
i did an upgrade from 10.04 to 10.10 and it just flat worked.. Fwiw
I had no problem but may be different for you..
